attributes.action: Abolish the Abortion Act 1967 in its entirety,
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition is created by the "Society of the Holy Face in Defence of Children."

More than six million Unborn Children have been aborted in Britain since the introduction of the Abortion Act in 1967.

This act allows for abortion to full term for disabled Unborn Children and where there may be grave or permanent injury to a woman's physical or mental health.

This act also allows for abortion to 24 weeks for any Unborn Child.

The Abortion Act is an immoral and unjust law. We can no longer, in all conscience, stand by whilst legalised abortion is allowed to continue.

All direct abortion is immoral and unecessary.

All Unborn Children ahould be protected by the criminal laws of Child Destruction and Illegal Abortion.

As Catholics, the "Society of the Holy Face in Defence of Children" sees that the Abortion Act has deprived millions of unborn souls of life and heaven, and has set millions more on the road to perdition. 

All right thinking people must see that this law should be repealed.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
